title: 求助，服务器问题
author: wa1019196051
txt_content:
每次服务器自动保存插件运行时。
服务器都会弹出以下代码12:48:45 [INFO] [SimpleBackup] Backing up .\world
12:48:51 [INFO] [SimpleBackup] Backing up .\world_nether
12:48:51 [INFO] [SimpleBackup] Backing up .\world_the_end
12:48:51 [INFO] [SimpleBackup] Backing up .\world2
12:48:52 [INFO] [SimpleBackup] Backup completed

12:49:38 [WARNING] Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server o
verloaded?
12:49:38 [SEVERE] java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\world\level.dat_new (拒绝访问
。)

replies.txt_content: 纯属正常现象，请别担心~

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 我该说插件与服务端不兼容呢？还是说服务端与原版插件不兼容呢。。。
